channel.title: Playing Half Life for the first time...
channel.description: Hello there! I'm playing Half Life 1 for the first time. Should I play the original version or should I go with the Black Mesa version which I hear is basically the original games with better graphics? Thank you!

item.title: Playing Half Life for the first time...

item.description:
And in the meantime, you can play the original
